name: LIBRARY
description: LIBRARY is a cute game about hanging out and throwing stuff at your new friends! Explore a cute library in first-person and enjoy the friends and rooms you come across...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 SPI+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities DirectX: Version 10 Storage: 250 MB available space
